AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented alien: individual being smuggled, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nine undocumented aliens: group of nine undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.seven other undocumented aliens: additional group of seven undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling, transported through South Texas with inadequate water and food
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: person who died during the smuggling operation due to heat stroke caused by the harsh conditions of the South Texas desert trek
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas, found to have recklessly contributed to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jaime Gomez-Arroyo: individual met by Border Patrol agents
